members.name: getElement
members.comment: Returns the element represented. This is the element that was changed.

members.name: getIndex
members.comment: Fetches the index within the element represented. This is the location that children were added and/or removed.

members.name: getChildrenRemoved
members.comment: Gets the child elements that were removed from the given parent element. The element array returned is sorted in the order that the elements used to lie in the document, and must be contiguous.

members.name: getChildrenAdded
members.comment: Gets the child elements that were added to the given parent element. The element array returned is in the order that the elements lie in the document, and must be contiguous.

name: javax.swing.event.DocumentEvent$ElementChange
comment: Describes changes made to a specific element.
